name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Aryu07066435 It shouldn't just be a matter of money. I saw in reports that the initial claim in 2019 was only 50,000 US dollars.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It seems that everyone thinks this is a matter of "money", but they seem to have overlooked the fact that this is a case that has been deadlocked for four years. Who would fight for four years for a matter that is not in their right? Of course, it seems that you have really made a profit from these four years, but when everything is still unresolved, facing a top entrepreneur with countless times more resources and connections than you, how much confidence do you have to fight for four years?
